Lanka Software Foundation

  • Contact
Building great
open source software
for Sri Lanka (and beyond!)

Code for Sri Lanka

LSF is helping the Government of Sri Lanka architect, build and deploy technology to improve governance and the quality of services provided to citizens

Build Partnerships & Capacity

We partner with government to build secure open source solutions as well as strong IT resource teams to manage and evolve solutions over time

Architect Digital Solutions

We advise government organizations on how best to architect scalable digital solutions in alignment with the long-term goals of a digital Sri Lanka

Support Global Enablement

We enable organizations to build open source software solutions that can be taken to other countries

Learn More

Get involved

If you want to see positive change in your country, be a part of it! Join us on our journey to transform government and impact lives

Join us on our journey to transform government and impact lives

Volunteer

Elections

We’re helping the Election Commission to build software to manage and run elections.
